response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product holds significant value to me due to its unique features and the hours of dedication put into its creation. Considering its exceptional quality and versatility, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. I am extending an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $15,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential appreciation for the product's capabilities and could potentially exceed your expectations. I look forward to the possibility of enhancing your experience with this remarkable item. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this extraordinary offer.", "product_price": 15000}
